name: JavaScript
Python

Ruby
code:
(1..100).each do |i|
  if i % 15 == 0
    puts 'FizzBuzz'
  elsif i % 3 == 0
    puts 'Fizz'
  elsif i % 5 == 0
    puts 'Buzz'
  else
    puts i
  end
end

name: C++
Swift
Kotlin
PHP
code:
<?php
for ($i = 1; $i <= 100; $i++) {
    if ($i % 15 == 0) {
        echo "FizzBuzz\n";
    } elseif ($i % 3 == 0) {
        echo "Fizz\n";
    } elseif ($i % 5 == 0) {
        echo "Buzz\n";
    } else {
        echo $i . "\n";
    }
}
?>
